properties.entry: SELECT /*com.greedy.memberlog.model.dao.MemberLogDAO#userLogin()*/ A.MEMBER_PASSWORD FROM TBL_MEMBER A WHERE A.MEMBER_ID = ?
SELECT /*com.greedy.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#searchById()*/ C.* FROM TBL_MEMBER C WHERE MEMBER_ID = ?
SELECT /*com.greedy.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#searchByGender()*/ D.* FROM TBL_MEMBER D WHERE D.GENDER = ?
UPDATE /*com.greedy.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#modifyPassword()*/ TBL_MEMBER E SET E.MEMBER_PWD = ? WHERE E.MEMBER_ID = ?
UPDATE /*com.greedy.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#modifyEmail()*/ TBL_MEMBER F SET F.EMAIL = ? WHERE F.MEMBER_ID = ?
UPDATE /*com.greedy.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#modifyPhone()*/ TBL_MEMBER G SET G.PHONE = ? WHERE G.MEMBER_ID = ?
UPDATE /*com.greedy.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#modifyAddress()*/ TBL_MEMBER H SET H.ADDRESS = ? WHERE H.MEMBER_ID = ?
DELETE /*com.greedy.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#deleteMember()*/ FROM TBL_MEMBER I WHERE I.MEMBER_ID = ?
